metadata.title: CVE-2017-7479 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: OpenVPN versions before 2.3.15 and before 2.4.2 are vulnerable to reachable assertion when packet-ID counter rolls over resulting into Denial of Service of server by authenticated attacker. It was discovered that OpenVPN improperly triggered an assert when packet ids rolled over. An authenticated remote attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (application crash).

notes.note: sbeattie> fix needs a87e1431baccd49a9344cfc63ab7446c4317fa2f (2.4) or 5d747770efa0611cc6cfeb6b3a5853bf51046d53 (2.3) as a prequisite

criterions.comment: openvpn package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.4.0-5ubuntu1').
